testcase.name: Amita Location Test Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given User is already on Home page..........................................passed When title of the Home page is Healthcare|Acension..........................passed Then User clicks on location button.........................................passed Then user clicks on search box..............................................passed And enter location "Carol Stream, IL 60188" and clicks on physical therapy button.passed Then user clicks on desired location........................................passed Then user sees details of the location......................................passed Then user closes browser....................................................passed
